item.title: SAMM Mappings
item.description: OpenCRE The SAMM model pages on the website have links to OpenCRE in every stream. By linking SAMM to OpenCRE , weâ€™ve made it easier for our users to find relevant and useful resources with every stream, as well as to see how SAMM aligns with other security standards such as NIST SSDF, ISO27K, PCI-DSS, OWASP ASVS, and NIST 800-53. Learn more in the OWASP SAMM now connects to OpenCRE blog post.
